category: news
title: "Adastra Joins Scale AI Supercluster Community; Actively Seeks AI Industry Use Cases to Transform Canadian Supply Chains"
excerpt: "Adastra Corporation, a global leader in Data Management, AI and Analytics, is proud to announce that it is now a part of the Scale AI community. Scale AI is a Government of Canada-supported supercluster aimed at leveraging Artificial Intelligence (AI) to boost the economic development of the country through the adoption and integration of AI into supply chains."
